body:
I really didn't know in which catagory i had to put this so here it is, so my team planned a scrim, but I had no idea which timing it was? is the time it says North-America is it +0 UTC stuff i dont know it! plz somebody tell me...
Example: June 21, 2015 at 11:00 Am - June 21, 2015 at 1:00PM... then it could be 10:00 Am where I live when it starts... like an 1 hour difference between the timing of avicus and my timing...

title: Scrimmage time

replies.body:
If your team planned a scrim, you should communicate with them and ask them when it is.
+0 UTC means that your time zone is "in sync" with the planned time.

For the future, keep this on Skype (or whatever method of communication your team uses), and ask your team about when scrimmages will take place.
